availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William H. Loughridge (Mason County, Kentucky, rope spinner)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, rope spinner. Ohio native. Son of Elizabeth Loughridge. Married to Elizabeth Gautt Loughridge in Mason County in February 1850. Married to Cleley A. Goldenburg Loughridge in Mason County on December 16, 1859. Rope spinner in Mason County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, p. 115A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mason County Marriages, 1796-1946, Film #000281843, p. 457 of 515 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
